title: feat: add elevenmusic model with duration-based billing
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Adds the 'elevenmusic' model to audio endpoints, enabling AI music generation with custom duration and instrumental options.
gist.impact: Users can now generate music tracks up to 5 minutes long with precise duration control and transparent per-second pricing.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot wearing headphones and mixing tracks on a retro synthesizer. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel violet gradient background. Musical notes floating in the air like fireflies. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
